title: eBay Enterprise : annual net revenue 1999 to 2014
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2011, slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
The line significantly increased by 574.0 from Year 2011 to 2012.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 1358.0 was reached at Year 2010
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 509.0 was reached at Year 2011
